title: intha kaNTE
sahitya:
intakaNTE kAvalenA kaSTamu cAladA rAma



anupallavi



suntainanu nA manasuku sukhamu lEka jEsitini gadA



caraNam



puTTina nATanuNDi I poTTa sAguTE panigA beTTi nalugurilO nAdu guTTu

bayalu jEsitini

iTTi guNamu galavADani gaTTiga nE telisikoNTi vaTTi mATa lETiki shrI

varada venkaTEshvara
